title: Make logout button clearly visible with dark color styling

requirements.summary: Update logout button styling in Header and LoginButton components to use dark colors for better visibility
acceptanceCriteria: The logout button/link is rendered with a dark color that provides strong contrast against its background
The logout option is visually distinguishable and easy to locate in the navigation bar
Dark color styling is applied consistently on both desktop and mobile views
The logout button remains functional (triggers logout when clicked)

file_operations.description: Update the logout button/link styling in the Header component's navigation (both desktop and mobile layouts) to use dark text colors (e.g., text-navy-900 or text-gray-900) with appropriate hover states for strong contrast against the navigation bar background. Ensure consistent dark styling across responsive breakpoints without altering logout functionality.

Modify the logout button state styling in the LoginButton component to use dark background or dark text colors (e.g., bg-navy-800 text-white or text-navy-900) that provide clear visibility. Update hover states to maintain dark color scheme while preserving the existing authentication logic and loading states.
